What's TradeLocker?

TradeLocker is a trading platform that connects traders with brokers and proprietary trading firms. It offers:

  • Access to multiple brokers and prop firms
  • Secure trading environment
  • Performance tracking
  • Integration capabilities with trading platforms

What can you trade with TradeLocker?

With TradeLocker, you can trade a variety of financial instruments depending on your broker and account type, including:

  • Forex: Major, minor, and exotic currency pairs.
  • Commodities: Gold, silver, oil, and other commodities.
  • Indices: Popular stock market indices such as S&P 500, NASDAQ, DAX, and more.
  • Cryptocurrencies: Bitcoin, Ethereum, and other cryptocurrencies (availability depends on broker).
  • CFDs: Contracts for Difference for various markets offered by your broker.

Note: The availability of instruments may vary depending on your chosen broker and account type (demo or live).

3 Get your account ID

You can find your account ID in the TradeLocker trading platform.

  1. Log in to the TradeLocker trading platform.
  2. Click on your profile icon in the bottom left corner to find your account ID.

By default we will use the first account if you have multiple accounts and you didn't specify a specific account ID.

Complete Integration

Once you have your TradeLocker login credentials, return to our platform's Automate section to link your TradeLocker account. This will enable automated trading through our system based on your TradingView alerts.
